title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Busy cursor not used during checkbox update
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Busy cursor not used during checkbox update
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, no busy cursor is displayed. This results in a delay of about 30 seconds in my case.
EB: The Export Zip feature should display a busy cursor during the update of the checkbox state. This will provide visual feedback to the user and indicate that the process is running.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects. 
2. Go to the Export Zip feature. 
3. Select all projects. 
4. Choose some file types. 
5. Click 'OK'.
